title: [GAME] Neeko and Smol Talon
body:
https://gfycat.com/InconsequentialMarvelousHeifer

This was the one time it happened. Talon transformations worked normally before and after this particular single instance.

######PS: We made a comeback and won that game :)

replies.body: Stop laughing! I AM THE HIDDEN BLADE!
ngl being small makes you better hidden
This is the opposite of a problem.
that's indeed adorable, she has multiple bugs right now.{{sticker:sg-lulu}}

> [{quoted}](name=Raefion,realm=EUW,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=jthY2Esy,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2019-03-21T19:52:33.550+0000)
>
> that's indeed adorable, she has multiple bugs right now.{{sticker:sg-lulu}}

Someone needs to take over now that Morde's being reworked.

>
> Someone needs to take over now that Morde's being reworked.

Thought that was "Magic Mike" {{champion:517}} 's job
Well, a chameleon has to eat somehow.

Vandiril did a video on this.  It happens because when Urgot executes someone, their model shrinks.

Either way, I hope they never patch this.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=hpI10FuC324
so op, they can't click you!
oh thank goodness he didn't get stepped on by that Ornn

He tried to murder me... {{sticker:sg-soraka}}
Is that how small Talon is in lore? I never knew!

LOL what the hell did I just see
Smol knifey boy about to one shot the adc
